deduced_league_settings.evidence_superflex: SFLEX position explicitly listed with J.J. McCarthy (QB) in that slot
deduced_league_settings.evidence_ppr: Heavy WR investment (5 WRs rostered) suggests PPR scoring system favoring reception volume
deduced_league_settings.evidence_tep_correction: Joseph clarified no TEP - Tyler Warren in FLEX due to roster depth limitations, not TE premium
deduced_league_settings.evidence_league_size: High-end rookies like Travis Hunter and Luther Burden rostered, suggests deeper league with scarcity

roster_construction_analysis.qb_strategy: Youth-focused rebuild - Caleb Williams (rookie) + J.J. McCarthy (rookie backup)
roster_construction_analysis.rb_strategy: Elite starter + developmental piece - Bijan Robinson (proven) + Jaylen Wright (upside)
roster_construction_analysis.wr_strategy: Rookie-heavy WR room - 3 of 5 WRs are rookies/2nd year (Hunter, Burden, McConkey)
roster_construction_analysis.te_strategy: Veteran stability + rookie upside - Hockenson (proven) + Warren (rookie TE)
roster_construction_analysis.overall_approach: Aggressive youth movement with championship timeline 2-3 years out

joseph_context.league_significance: Home league with close real life friends - bragging rights and fun
joseph_context.rebuild_timeline: Tear down rebuild a few months ago with drastic changes and well-timed moves
joseph_context.emergence_status: Something is starting to emerge from the rebuild

personal_favorites.wr_core: Puka Nacua, Ladd McConkey, Travis Hunter - Joseph's three favorite players
personal_favorites.emotional_connection: WR core is special (tears roll down cheek)
personal_favorites.bias_acknowledgment: Don't let my bias carry too much weight

joseph_context.roster_depth_reality: Team weak in depth, pulling together what's available

puka_acquisition.trade_details: Traded away De'Von Achane to acquire Puka Nacua
puka_acquisition.market_context: People assumed Round 5 pick would be usurped by Cooper Kupp
puka_acquisition.joseph_insight: Clear to Joseph that Puka already had usurped Kupp
puka_acquisition.strategy: Flipped high-value RB into WR for longevity concerns
puka_acquisition.outcome: Puka became cemented as top 5 WR as Joseph predicted
puka_acquisition.irony: Puka gets hurt, Achane doesn't - fantasy football luck

rb_safety_assumption.influence: Affected by assumption that RBs were not safe
rb_safety_assumption.decision_impact: Caused trade decision that didn't age well in injury context
rb_safety_assumption.learning: RB injury assumptions can lead to suboptimal roster decisions
rb_safety_assumption.connection_to_yesterday: Discussed how RB safety fears influenced decision-making
